name: Visionera
overview:
Visionera AB Founded in 2001, Visionera AB is an IT company supplying, besides VisionProject, business development services to help enhancing their customersâ€™ internal processes in combination with VisionProject. VisionProject today has hundreds of customers spread over 40 countries with thousands of users. Visionera AB has offices in Stockholm, BÃ¥stad and Malta.

VisionProject VisionProject is a powerful Web-based Project Management and Issue Tracking System that also includes modules for HelpDesk/Support, Time Management, Document management, Product/Service management and much more. VisionProject is built to be easy to use and customizable â€“ all to increase team productivity and efficiency in the customer organization. The extensive functionality offered includes drag-and-drop, search possibilities also within the attached documents, sub-items, web portal for external customers, support for popular concepts used in Project Management and IT Service Management, such as ITIL, Scrum, Lean, Waterfall, etc.
